movie.title: Winter's Bone
movie.description_intro: Her family home in danger of being repossessed after her dad skips bail and disappears, Ozark teen Ree Dolly (Jennifer Lawrence) breaks the local code of conduct by confronting her kin about their conspiracy of silence. Should she fail to track her father down, Ree Dolly, her younger siblings, and their disabled mother will soon be rendered homeless.
movie.description_full: Her family home in danger of being repossessed after her dad skips bail and disappears, Ozark teen Ree Dolly (Jennifer Lawrence) breaks the local code of conduct by confronting her kin about their conspiracy of silence. Should she fail to track her father down, Ree Dolly, her younger siblings, and their disabled mother will soon be rendered homeless.

movies.title: Dead Sushi
movies.summary: Keiko, the daughter of a legendary sushi chef, runs away from home when his Karate-style regimen becomes too severe. Finding work at a rural hot springs inn, she is ridiculed by the eccentric staff and guests.
movies.description_full: Keiko, the daughter of a legendary sushi chef, runs away from home when his Karate-style regimen becomes too severe. Finding work at a rural hot springs inn, she is ridiculed by the eccentric staff and guests.
movies.synopsis: Keiko, the daughter of a legendary sushi chef, runs away from home when his Karate-style regimen becomes too severe. Finding work at a rural hot springs inn, she is ridiculed by the eccentric staff and guests.

movies.title: Devil's Night: Dawn of the Nain Rouge
movies.title_english: Devil's Night: Dawn of the Nain Rouge
movies.title_long: Devil's Night: Dawn of the Nain Rouge (2020)
movies.summary: A military veteran who returns home, works in law enforcement and she's assigned to a supernatural case that's surrounded by urban myth and legend.
movies.description_full: A military veteran who returns home, works in law enforcement and she's assigned to a supernatural case that's surrounded by urban myth and legend.
movies.synopsis: A military veteran who returns home, works in law enforcement and she's assigned to a supernatural case that's surrounded by urban myth and legend.

movies.title: Three Dramas
movies.summary: "A Woman with a Past and Present," based on John Galsworthy's The Sun, a woman struggles to chose between her present lover and the one that is returning. "Knot It," based on Susan Glaspell's Trifles, is about the investigation of the mysterious death of a husband, possibly by his wife. The Letter, based on Eugene O'Neill's Before Breakfast, is about a wife who's love for her husband has deteriorated, because of his life style and because of her own insecurities.
movies.description_full: "A Woman with a Past and Present," based on John Galsworthy's The Sun, a woman struggles to chose between her present lover and the one that is returning. "Knot It," based on Susan Glaspell's Trifles, is about the investigation of the mysterious death of a husband, possibly by his wife. The Letter, based on Eugene O'Neill's Before Breakfast, is about a wife who's love for her husband has deteriorated, because of his life style and because of her own insecurities.

movies.title: The Final Girls
movies.summary: When Max (Taissa Farmiga) and her friends reluctantly attend a tribute screening of an infamous '80s slasher film that starred Max's late mother (Malin Akerman), they are accidentally sucked into the silver screen. They soon realize they are trapped inside the cult classic movie and must team up with the fictional and ill-fated "Camp Bloodbath" counselors, including Max's mom as the shy scream queen, to battle the film's machete-wielding, masked killer. With the body count rising in scene after iconic scene, who will be THE FINAL GIRLS left standing and live to escape this film?
